answers.answer: It depends on the adoption program you are with. Some only cover the actual birthing bills while others cover everything including maternity wear. If the $4,500 is medication specifically for the pregnancy then it is completly reasonable for the adopting parents to pay. If it is for something else (like diabetes or adhd meds) then it may be best if you split it or just talk to them. I would check with your agency.

question: Hi everyone.....quick ? To those out there who chose adoption for their babies....did the adoptive parents reimburse you for medical expenses related to the preg.? Is it odd for me to expect about $4500 for my med.? Or is this common/understandable?
title: Help! Need some opinions!
